<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Clone Data Profile</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/dlp/api/v1/dss-api/data-profile/id/{profileId}"}></MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::

Clones a data profile.
